meanings.definition: A woman who is loved or admired by another person.
meanings.sent1: The ladyloves of the town always had a kind smile for everyone.
meanings.sent2: He wrote a love letter to his ladyloves, expressing his admiration.
meanings.sent3: The ladyloves at the party were the center of attention, making everyone feel special.
meanings.sent4: She was like a bright star in the sky, shining with the love of her ladyloves.
meanings.sent5: The ladyloves in the storybook had hearts full of kindness and grace.

meanings.definition: To love or admire a woman.
meanings.sent1: He ladyloves his wife more than anything in the world.
meanings.sent2: She ladyloves spending time with her family on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The little boy ladyloves his mom's homemade cookies.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter ladyloves through the room, bringing joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The artist ladyloves the beauty of nature, capturing it in every painting.
